## decodeCredentialToObject() function

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

Parses a [W3CVerifiableCredential](./core.w3cverifiablecredential.md) and converts it to a [VerifiableCredential](./core.verifiablecredential.md) so it is easier to use programmatically.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function decodeCredentialToObject(input: W3CVerifiableCredential): VerifiableCredential
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                         | Description                                                                                |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| input     | [W3CVerifiableCredential](./core.w3cverifiablecredential.md) | the raw credential to be transformed This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[VerifiableCredential](./core.verifiablecredential.md)
